result.ponchtml: Ṫóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roiṁ an láThey took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.

result.eng: The day I was set free I felt happy.
result.ga: An lá fuair mé cead na coise b'éadrom mo chroí
result.orig: An lá fuair mé cead na coise b'éadrom mo chroí
result.html: An lá fuair mé cead na coise b'éadrom mo chroíThe day I was set free I felt happy.
result.ponchtml: An lá fuair mé cead na coise b'éadrom mo ċroíThe day I was set free I felt happy.

result.eng: The next morning Jamie was his old self again.
result.ga: Lá arna mhárach bhí Séimí arís ina chruth féin
result.orig: Lá arna mhárach bhí Séimí arís ina chruth féin
result.html: Lá arna mhárach bhí Séimí arís ina chruth féinThe next morning Jamie was his old self again.
result.ponchtml: Lá arna ṁáraċ ḃí Séimí arís ina ċruṫ féinThe next morning Jamie was his old self again.

result.eng: I don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ga: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.orig: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.html: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ponchtml: Níl feiḋm orm aon lá oibre a ḋéanaṁ le mo ẛolas Tá mé i mo ẛáiṫ den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
